product_name: Levi's Packable Commuter Bike Vest - Men's
long_description: Say you're ready to ride home from work and you realize it's gotten chillier out than you thought. Pull out your Levi's Packable Commuter Bike Vest and give your core some warmth! Snap-front polyester vest has 60g of warm synthetic insulation. Packs into the rear zippered pocket. Levi's Packable Commuter Bike Vest also has 1 front vertical side-seam pocket and 1 horizontal pocket. Reflective trim enhances your visibilitly in low light.
short_description: Say you're ready to ride home from work and you realize it's gotten chillier out than you thought. Pull out your Levi's Packable Commuter Bike Vest and give your core some warmth!
